
## Plotting Function to Display Rhat Distribution {.unnumbered}


### Description

This plotting function displays a histogram of the Rhat values of all parameters in an <code>idealstan</code> model.



### Usage

<pre><code class='language-R'>id_plot_rhats(obj)
</code></pre>


### Arguments

<table>
<tr><td style = "white-space: nowrap; font-family: monospace; vertical-align: top"><code id="obj">obj</code></td>
<td>
A fitted <code>idealstan</code> object.
</td></tr>
</table>
